title: ‘You Can See the Demand Out There for Bitcoin’: Franklin Templeton CEO
description: The global asset manager’s Bitcoin ETF is the latest in blockchain-related investment opportunities.

title: Former IcomTech CEO sentenced to five years in prison for wire fraud
description:
Judge Jennifer Rochon ordered the forfeiture of $914,000 and Marco Ochoa to surrender to authorities by March 19.

According to a Jan. 19 filing in United States District Court for the Southern District of New York, Judge Jennifer Rochon ordered the forfeiture of $914,000 and for Ochoa to voluntarily surrender for his 60-month sentence, beginning on March 19. He will have two years of supervised release.

Marco Ochoa, the former CEO of crypto mining firm IcomTech, has been sentenced to five years in prison following a guilty plea for conspiracy to commit wire fraud.

In September, Ochoa pleaded guilty to one count of conspiracy to commit wire fraud related to a crypto-based Ponzi scheme at IcomTech. He was CEO of the mining firm from 2018 to 2019.

Read more

description:

title: Bitcoin dips to lowest level since Dec. 12 before bouncing as buyers hold $40k threshold
description:
Bitcoin slumped to as low as $40,280 on Jan. 19, its lowest level since Dec. 12, 2023, before rebounding to $41,979 after four hours of consistent sell pressure that liquidated most long positions on major exchanges. As of press time, Bitcoin traded at $41,609 after failing to breach $42,000. Meanwhile, long liquidations stood at roughly […]

title: Fidelity and BlackRock drive surge in U.S. Bitcoin ETF investments
description: The cryptocurrency market has witnessed a substantial influx of capital into U.S. spot bitcoin Exchange-Traded Funds (ETFs), with Fidelity and BlackRock showing dominant performance. Data from BitMEX Research indicates that the first five days of trading saw nearly $1.2 billion in net flows. Fidelity’s ETF joined BlackRock, each amassing over $1 billion in inflows. Bitwise […]

title: Ark Invest doubles down on its ETF amid a shift from BITO
description: In recent financial maneuvers, ARK Invest has executed a strategic shift, steering away from the ProShares Bitcoin Strategy ETF (BITO) and redirecting funds into its recently launched spot Bitcoin ETF. A trading disclosure on January 18 uncovered that the ARK Next Generation Internet ETF (ARKW) successfully divested 758,915 shares of BITO, valued at approximately $15 […]
